p: E. cardamomum (L.) Maton, belonging to the Zingiberaceae family (local name: cardamom), is an expensive and commercially significant spice that is in demand worldwide. Although it is native to India and Sri Lanka, it is also grown in Guatemala, Thailand, El Salvador, Malay Archipelago, Vietnam, Papua New Guinea, Cambodia, Laos, and Tanzania, with Guatemala being the largest producer of E. cardamomum in the world [ 1, 2].
